headline: Equinix Taps AI Leadership for Digital Innovation Might Change The Case For Investing In EQIX
summary: On November 13, 2025, Equinix appointed Yang Song, Ph.D., as Senior Vice President and Chief Data Science and AI Officer, reporting to Harmeen Mehta and tasked with leading the company's global data science and AI initiatives. Song’s track record of building high-performing AI organizations at Apple and IBM Research signals Equinix's intent to embed AI-driven intelligence across its platforms and operations. We'll explore how Song’s mandate to drive AI innovation could influence Equinix's...
